downloadTitle: Microsoft OH-SBE 3.0 Management Pack for MOM 2005
downloadDescription: Microsoft OH-SBE 3.0 Management Pack monitors Order Handling SBE 3.0 services and their availability
detailsSection:
Microsoft Order Handling Standard Business Event (OHSBE) 3.0 Management Pack for MOM monitors the Order Handling SBE 3.0 services application event log. This management pack is build for monitoring both OHSBE 3.0 Web and Windows services generated events. It includes event rules for the OHSBE Monitor windows service and OHSBE Hosting web service. The events collected from each individual service indicate critical issues, informational events and error events generated during various OHSBE 3.0 configurations and process flows. In addition different monitoring and corrective tasks allows detection and curing of service outages.

Feature Summary:

OH SBE 3.0 services generated Error and Informational events.
OH SBE 3.0 service monitoring events indicating services health status.
Alerts indicating configuration issues for services
State monitoring view for various component services health status
Tasks to facilitate monitoring and control OH SBE 3.0 services
Notification if windows services outrage

Release and Update History:

6/30/2006 Original product release date (Version 03.0.0000.0000).
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Windows Server™ 2003 Enterprise Edition Service Pack 1 (SP1)
